title: bugsplat
body: wieso kommt immer wenn ich lol starte bugsplat?? https://gyazo.com/6cc8a2afa1e6f836d14f12923b7f7cc0?token=807a766409cc6a91113057d150cc91da

replies.body:
Könnte an einem Fehler während des Updates liegen. 

Um deinen Client zu reparieren kannst du dir das [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/articles/224826367-Automatisierte-Fehlerbehebung-Hextech-Repair-Tool) herunterladen um den Client zu reparieren und neu patchen zu lassen. (Achte darauf dass das Häkchen bei "Force Repatch" gesetzt ist.)

Yo! So yesterday my game just shut down, and when I tried to open it again, it just said "Bugsplatt.dll is missing, pls download it and try again. What I did, was to go to (Control panel, Remove a program). I Found League of Legens, and I removed it from my computer. The next thing I did was to go (This PC, Windows (C) and then I found the Riot Games folder! Delete that, and then reinstall League of Legends! Thats what helped me out! Hope it can help you guys!
